content: उत्सादनं {@--1@} Destroying, overturning; उत्सादनार्थं लोकानां <ls>Mb.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Suspending, interrupting. {@--3@} Cleaning the person with perfumes, chafing the limbs; <ls>Ms. 2. 209</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">211.</ls> {@--4@} Healing a sore. {@--5@} Going up, ascending, rising. {@--6@} Elevating, raising. {@--7@} Ploughing a field twice (or thoroughly).
